channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Female-founded semiconductor AI startup SixSense raises $8.5M
item.description: SixSense offers an AI-powered platform that helps chip makers prevent defects. It landed backing led by Peak XV’s Surge (formerly Sequoia India & SEA)...

item.title: Uber’s Drive to Become the Kleenex of Robotaxis
item.description: It doesn’t matter who makes the tech—when you call a robocar, Uber’s mission now is to make sure you use its app.

item.title: Apple projects tariff costs will hit $1.1B next quarter
item.description: While sales growth suggests fear of tariffs helped fuel sales, Cook downplayed the “pull forward” effect, noting that consumers were more motivated by...

item.title: Surfshark Promo Codes: 87% Off | August 2025
item.description: Save up to 87% with a Surfshark coupon code, 3 months of VPN free today, and more August 2025 discounts from WIRED.

item.title: Canon Promo Codes: 10% Off | August 2025
item.description: Save 10%, plus over $500 on cameras, lenses, and more with today’s Canon coupons for new and refurbished tech.

item.title: The Best Mouth Tape (2025)
item.description: TikTokkers and biohackers are fast to recommend mouth tape for better sleep. But it’s not a solution for everyone.

item.title: Amazon CEO wants to put ads in your Alexa+ conversations
item.description: Andy Jassy's description of an AI-generated ad that Alexa+ delivers in a multistep conversation, which could help users find new products, is uncharte...

item.title: The Best Sex Toys (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These are our favorite gender-inclusive vibrators, wand massagers, and sleeves to give you and your partner(s) a helping hand.

item.title: Handwave lends a hand to retailers with its European alternative to Amazon’s palm payments
item.description: Latvian startup Handwave aims to compete with Amazon palm payments by offering an independent alternative.

item.title: Reddit revenue soars as it bets on AI and advertising
item.description: Reddit reported its Q2 earnings, and it’s clear that its focus on AI has ramped up significantly.
